verifyBlockLoyalty().details: A method for loyalty hodlers to verify block loyalty

withdrawLoyalty().details: allowsloyalty hodler to withdraw tokens stored in the account for daily reward structure, user must deposit tokens in order to claim rewards

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
